text: This remarkable man of medicine, whom Sir Francis Burdett described to Anglesey a year or two later as 'more like a God upon earth than a human being had an One of these was the Neapolitan, Dr Giuseppe Mauro, whom Anglesey consulted in May 1834.
handwritten_text: This remarkable man of medicine, whom Sir Francis Burdett described to Anglesey a year or two later as 'more like a God upon earth than a human being had an One of these was the Neapolitan, Dr Giuseppe Mauro, whom Anglesey consulted in May 1834.
